title: Life on the bright side belongs here!
posting_body: We are an all-new community that’s redefining urban luxury in the South Shore neighborhood of Austin, Texas.
Our brand-new studio, one, and two bedroom apartments are designed with sophistication and class.
Premium features and spacious floor plans will make you the envy of your crew while offering an everyday sanctuary from whatever the world is throwing at you.
Your downtime will get a pick-me-up with the community’s A-grade amenities.
Take a dip in the swimming pool, sweat it out at the state-of-the-art fitness center, quiet your mind in the lush courtyard, or simply grab a latte at the social station in the resident lounge.
We have all the perks of modern living and a few you never knew you were missing.
Connect with us and come see what life could be.
